creator: Debitoor
descriptionHtml:
Simple, fast, and intuitive invoice app and easy accounting for small businesses, sole traders, and freelancers. Debitoor invoicing and easy accounting software give​ you the tools you need to create and send professional-looking invoices from anywhere, anytime. Get started now to create and send your first invoice in less than a minute. Invoice anytime, anywhere: not matter on what device

INVOICE FROM ANYWHERE
• Customised invoices that help you stand out from the competition.
• Share invoices via email, Messenger, WhatsApp, PDF, and more.
• Get notified as soon as an invoice is viewed by a customer.
• Draft invoices even when offline - they’ll be ready when you reconnect.

GET PAID FASTER
• Connect online payment to get paid up to 14 days faster.
• SumUp, PayPal, GoCardless and more.
• Accept card payments of invoices in person by pairing your phone with a SumUp card reader.
• See which invoices are overdue at a glance and follow-up from the app.

EXPENSES IN A SNAP
• Capture expenses on the go and in the moment you spend.
• Attach a receipt to your expense by taking a picture with your smartphone.
• Automatically reads important details from your receipt and suggests the best category for your expense.

QUOTES ANYTIME
• Create a quote fast to send an estimate to a customer.
• Get notified as soon as a quote is viewed by a customer.
• Convert accepted quotes to invoices with a tap.

ACCOUNTING AN ACCOUNTANT CAN LOVE
• Export all invoices and expenses to your own accountant in a clean data format.
• Invite your accountant to your account for easy collaboration.
• Manage and report your VAT directly to HMRC with Making Tax Digital software
• Generate P&L (Profit and Loss) reports from the web app.
• Stay on top of your business accounting with balance sheet

MANAGE YOUR CUSTOMERS
• Instantly import customer details from your mobile contacts.
• Add customer information to a new invoice with a tap.
• Access customer details even when offline.

YOUR PRODUCTS OR SERVICE
• Save and edit product or service details in your account.
• Add products/service to new invoices with a tap.

INTERNATIONAL
• Easily change the language of your invoices to cater to your customer.
• Change the invoice currency with the latest conversion rates.

PLUS…
• Credit notes, proforma invoices, delivery notes, reminders, payment receipts & more from our full browser version.
• Free, world-class customer support.
• 100% cloud-based: access your account from any device.

Created to help small businesses thrive.
descriptionShort: Create and send quotes & invoices, record expenses, and manage your business.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Greetings!

Thank you for using Debitoor!
This release contains minor bug fixes and improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Greetings!
Thanks for using Debitoor.

We've made design changes to the dashboard and haptic feedback has also been implemented. Yes, it's like magic!

The connection to the SumUp Card Reader has been upgraded, fixing an issue and getting it in top working order.
We also did some text formatting to realign text on some buttons.

For our Austrian users, we now support the new tax rates.

Lastly: there is now no excuse for not downloading the app - the size is now just 50% of what it used to be!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Greetings!
Thanks for using Debitoor.

This release brings some noticeable changes to the app. It's time to give it the beautiful design that it deserves and we're excited to introduce a cool new look :-)

We have, amongst other things, redesigned and updated the:
- Home screen
- Invoice builder
- Tax section
- Modals
- Plus: updated colours and many other cool things

The complete overhaul of the app has begun and we look forward to sharing more with you!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Greetings dear Debitoor user!

We're so happy you're updating to the latest version of the app.
Why? Because we have some exciting developments to share with you!

We've spent quite a bit of time making improvements to the 'Send' and 'Share' options in the app.
We've also squashed some bugs, as well as remedied a problem with changing your bank information.

And you can already be looking forward to the next release... ;-)

Take care and have a nice day.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Greetings!

We've heard you. So we are bringing back a call-to-action button on the homepage. Now it's even faster to create a new invoice, quote, expense etc.

And consider visiting our plan page. It's got a great new look, in our opinion. :-)

In this release we've also fixed some bugs. One that caused frustration prevented the deletion of a draft from the Home screen. Now you can!

Thanks for using Debitoor.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome to version 7.3!

We're excited to bring you this update as it gets us one step closer to a completely redesigned Debitoor app.

This time we've worked on the 'Customers' section, which we hope will bring a spark of joy to your eyes.
Believe it or not, the standard bug fix comment has been left out as we encountered no issues.

We hope you enjoy Debitoor as much as we enjoy creating software to help you run your business.

• Get notified as soon as a quote is viewed by a customer.
• Convert accepted quotes to invoices with a tap.

ACCOUNTING AN ACCOUNTANT CAN LOVE
• Export all invoices and expenses to your own accountant in a clean data format.
• Invite your accountant to your account for easy collaboration.
• Manage and report your VAT directly to HMRC with Making Tax Digital software
• Generate P&L (Profit and Loss) reports from the web app.
• Stay on top of your business accounting with balance sheet

MANAGE YOUR CUSTOMERS
• Instantly import customer details from your mobile contacts.
• Add customer information to a new invoice with a tap.
• Access customer details even when offline.

YOUR PRODUCTS OR SERVICE
• Save and edit product or service details in your account.
• Add products/service to new invoices with a tap.

INTERNATIONAL
• Easily change the language of your invoices to cater to your customer.
• Change the invoice currency with the latest conversion rates.

PLUS…
• Credit notes, proforma invoices, delivery notes, reminders, payment receipts & more from our full browser version.
• Free, world-class customer support.
• 100% cloud-based: access your account from any device.

Created to help small businesses thrive.
descriptionShort: Create and send quotes & invoices, record expenses, and manage your business.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Greetings!

Thank you for using Debitoor.
This release contains minor bug fixes and improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome to a new version of Debitoor.

In 7.4.1 we've made some enhancements to improve the performance of the app.

Also, we're bringing back the invoice tutorial for all new users to provide a little more guidance in creating and issuing their first invoice.

Happy invoicing!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome to version 7.5!

In the spirit of holiday giving, we're excited to bring you a beautiful and more user-friendly screen for sending invoices.

Additionally, we've worked hard to further improve e-invoicing for our Italian merchants. This is something that will also benefit many users in other countries in the future.

We're already looking into even more updates and improvements in the new year.

Wishing you a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!

- The Debitoor team

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Happy New Year and welcome to version 7.6!

2021 will bring many exciting updates, and we're happy to kick things off with a little design refresh and the addition of a splash screen.

Be prepared for some changes from the very start, as both the login and sign up screens have a new look heading into the year.

We've also updated the bank transaction titles that caused some issues, as well squashed a few other pesky bugs.

Happy invoicing!

- The Debitoor team

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome to version 7.7

This version is all about Brexit.

Previously, when you recorded an invoice or expense in your Debitoor account for a UK VAT registered business, the reverse charge VAT of 0% would automatically be applied.

Now, we offer the flexibility of toggling the reverse charge on or off for all UK transactions.

Happy invoicing!

The Debitoor Team

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome!

Version 8.0 brings many new changes, including a brand new App Store universe!

You'll find some noticeable updates on the invoice, quote and expense detail screens.
We've also updated the plan modals and screens - to make it even easier to subscribe to Debitoor! ;-)

Last but not least, the Settings screen has received a complete overhaul.

We hope you like it!

The Debitoor Team

• Customised invoices that help you stand out from the competition.
• Share invoices via email, Messenger, WhatsApp, PDF, and more.
• Get notified as soon as an invoice is viewed by a customer.
• Draft invoices even when offline - they’ll be ready when you reconnect.

GET PAID FASTER
• Connect online payment to get paid up to 14 days faster.
• SumUp, PayPal and more.
• Accept card payments of invoices in person by pairing your phone with a SumUp card reader.
• See which invoices are overdue at a glance and follow-up from the app.

EXPENSES IN A SNAP
• Capture expenses on the go and in the moment you spend.
• Attach a receipt to your expense by taking a picture with your smartphone.
• Automatically reads important details from your receipt and suggests the best category for your expense.

QUOTES ANYTIME
• Create a quote fast to send an estimate to a customer.
• Get notified as soon as a quote is viewed by a customer.
• Convert accepted quotes to invoices with a tap.

ACCOUNTING AN ACCOUNTANT CAN LOVE
• Export all invoices and expenses to your own accountant in a clean data format.
• Invite your accountant to your account for easy collaboration.
• Manage and report your VAT directly to HMRC with Making Tax Digital software
• Generate P&L (Profit and Loss) reports from the web app.
• Stay on top of your business accounting with balance sheet

MANAGE YOUR CUSTOMERS
• Instantly import customer details from your mobile contacts.
• Add customer information to a new invoice with a tap.
• Access customer details even when offline.

YOUR PRODUCTS OR SERVICE
• Save and edit product or service details in your account.
• Add products/service to new invoices with a tap.

INTERNATIONAL
• Easily change the language of your invoices to cater to your customer.
• Change the invoice currency with the latest conversion rates.

PLUS…
• Credit notes, proforma invoices, delivery notes, reminders, payment receipts & more from our full browser version.
• Free, world-class customer support.
• 100% cloud-based: access your account from any device.

Created to help small businesses thrive.
descriptionShort: Create and send quotes & invoices, record expenses, and manage your business.

Thank you for using Debitoor.
This release contains minor bug fixes and improvements.
